Package org.forgerock.openidm.metadata.impl

Class ProviderTracker

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.metadata.impl.ProviderTracker
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServiceTrackerListener<MetaDataProvider,MetaDataProvider>
public class ProviderTracker extends Object implements ServiceTrackerListener<MetaDataProvider,MetaDataProvider>
Keep track of meta data providers, either declared in bundle meta-data, or registered as services.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProviderTracker

      public ProviderTracker(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext context, ProviderListener listener, boolean notifyDuringInit)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      context - a bundle context to access OSGi
      listener - the listener to notify when a provider change was detecte
      notifyDuringInit - whether to notify the listener during the ProviderTracker construction. Setting it to false allows to query the providers acquired during init with getProviders, and to process additional providers via the listener.
